sentences.sContent: The biomaterial was replaced by connective tissue within 6 weeks.
sentences.sContent_eng: The biomaterial was replaced by connective tissue within 6 weeks.
sentences.sCn: 在6周之内，此种生物材料逐渐被结缔组织取代。

sentences.sContent: It is also encased in membranes of connective tissue called the meninges.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is also encased in membranes of connective tissue called the meninges.
sentences.sCn: 它还被一些结缔组织的膜所包裹，这些膜叫做脑膜。

sentences.sContent: Hyaluronan is a mucopolysaccharude present in connective tissue that prevents the spread of substances through the subcutneous space.
sentences.sContent_eng: Hyaluronan is a mucopolysaccharude present in connective tissue that prevents the spread of substances through the subcutneous space.
sentences.sCn: 透明质酸是一种酸性粘多糖，存在于结缔组织中，防止物质在皮下空间扩散。

trans.tranOther: parts of the body such as muscle or fat that exist between or join organs and other body parts
